io.tarantool.driver

Class StandaloneTarantoolClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tarantool.driver.StandaloneTarantoolClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TarantoolClient, AutoCloseable

    public class StandaloneTarantoolClient
extends Object
implements TarantoolClient
    Main class for connecting to a single Tarantool server. Provides basic API for interacting with the database and manages connections.

    • Constructor Summary
